node.display_long_description:
Synth Riders is a freestyle dancing rhythm alternative with official custom song support. Lose yourself in the incredible music, meet friends in the multiplayer, and get a good workout in the process!

• Dance to 55 free and 20 DLC songs including Muse and The Offspring
• Enjoy Official Custom Song Support (on the primary account)
• Meet 10 Friends in Cross-platform Multiplayer
• Experience 360° Spin Mode in Every Song
• Burn Calories with a Fitness Smartwatch

Demo now available on App Lab!

“An amazing full-body physical experience” - VR Fitness Insider
“An excellent, freestyling alternative to other VR rhythm games” - Android Central

The trailer presents the Experience for "Come Out and Play" by The Offspring. It is a DLC available for $1.99 or as a part of the "Adrenaline" Music Pack.

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
- Sort & Filter sticks through songs again
- Algorithm Experience showing blue screen when played on the Oculus Link (Quest Only)
- Minor improvements to the Offspring experience (Quest Only)
- Twitch Integration - Song request queue history now available, saving the last 25 requests in the order received! Just click on the queue header to show the history (PCVR Only)
- Oculus SDK change to help players unable to start the game on Quest after the Adrenaline update (Quest Only)

node.display_short_description: Dance all night and never run out of tunes with the ultimate collection including 20 songs, 2 stages, and 2 experiences, from Muse to The Offspring to Parov Stelar!

nodes.title: "Adrenaline" feat. The Offspring is now out!
nodes.body_text:
Rock out to The Offsprings!

The "Adrenaline" Music Pack is now available featuring 8 new songs!

This new pack will have you jumping straight into the mosh pit with the greatest hits of iconic punk rock artists including The Offspring, Bad Religion, and Rancid. The pack comes with 3 free songs and 5 paid DLC songs.

The song “Come Out And Play” by The Offspring comes bundled with the second Synth Riders Experience, this time packed with punk style and rock attitude tailored to match the track with perfectly synced visuals.

Check out a trailer for the new Experience.

Free songs are already in your library! DLC songs can be purchased for $1.99 or as a bundle with a 20% discount.

You are invited to join our Community on Discord and leave a review on the Oculus Store to support the development.

See you in the game!

nodes.title: You are invited for the "Sunday Sessions" Multiplayer Events!
nodes.body_text:
We invite you for the "Sunday Sessions", a brand new weekly event in the Multiplayer Mode of Synth Riders, Europe-friendly!

Every Sunday at 1PM PST / 10PM CET, join us to enjoy amazing music, dance with friends, meet new people, and get a good workout in the process.

Our host HeyFalcon will jump between the rooms to get the party going.

The legendary "Saturday Synth Fever" is still going to run every Saturday at 6PM!

You can subscribe to both Oculus Events for upcoming weeks to make sure you don't miss the party.

See you in the game!

node.reviewDescription:
I’m not going to sit here and compare this game to the other rhythm games. I enjoy Beat Saber, just as much as I enjoy Pistol Whip and Audio Trip. I think all these games offer something a little different and I’m happy to switch it up and play them all. 

But there is something about Synth Riders that affects me a little differently. It puts me into almost a zen-like state. It relaxes me to a point even. 

I will go on to add that I found an escape with this game while recently dealing with the loss of my brother. He passed from cancer, months after being diagnosed. It was sudden, and hard to comprehend. Somehow this game allowed me to free my mind and just lose myself in the motions. I don’t know why I react so different to it vs the other games, but I have a special appreciation for it.

website_page_meta.description: Synth Riders is a freestyle dancing rhythm alternative with official custom song support. Lose yourself in the incredible music, meet friends in the multiplayer, and get a good workout in the process!
website_page_meta.title: Synth Riders · Oculus Quest
